title: Mr Apocalypse
description: London has been cut off from the rest of civilisation.The people there abide by no rules. There is no police presence. No laws or consequences. There is only the ravaged city, hidden behind two superwalls since the riots of 2011.And yet they are not alone.One of the survivors of 2011, a mysterious loner, is close to discovering the truth about his life in this nightmare of a city. And when he finds out, he'll discover exactly why no one on the outside is in a hurry to release the Londoners back into society. Mr Apocalypse is a thrilling, fast-paced dystopian novel set in an alternate London. It is the second book in the Future of London series.
author: Mark  Gillespie
